subscribers_scoring.title: Subscribers Scoring Admin
subscribers_scoring.description: Customize the criteria you want to use to qualify each Subscriber. If you don't, the scoring will be based on a suggestion for a good performance analysis. The Subscribers will be scored 24 hours after you've defined the values for each category. Any doubts? Press
